metadata.title: CVE-2023-29839 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in multiple pagesof Hotel Druid version 3.0.4, which allows arbitrary execution of commands.The vulnerable fields are Surname, Name, and Nickname in the Documentfunction.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
